lead_paragraph: Now it’s official: Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, and Fabrice P. Tourre, a/k/a the “Fabulous Fab,” will both appear at a Senate hearing next week after federal regulators accused the firm and Mr. Tourre of securities fraud. But don’t expect Mr. Blankfein and Mr. Tourre to be in the hearing room at the same time.

headline.main: ‘Fabulous Fab’ Unlikely to Cross Blankfein’s Path
